document.full_text: the bank of england kept its key interest rate at 0.5 percent on thursday, in a widely expected move after a run of subdued data which has cast doubt on the strength of britain's economic recovery.
document.title: boe keeps rates steady at 0.5 percent as expected
lines_and_colors: the bank of england kept its key interest rate at 0.5 percent on thursday, in a widely expected move after a run of subdued data which has cast doubt on the strength of britain's economic recovery.
